item.description:
Ok, I and most of you will be going to a Christmas Gathering somewhere..
Drive Carefully and enjoy the day...
Im visiting my Dad and maybe friends out in Columbia CT later in the day..so instead of just being lazy and becomming a fat porker, i want to go to a very unique place for a walk before i head out....
The snow should be mostly washed away by this day and it looks warm enough..

THIS MIGHT BE A NEXT TO PLACE WHERE YOU WILL KAYAK SOMETIME ALSO..

Weather ? Lemme look:

Monday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. West wind between 13 and 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

Monday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 28. West wind between 5 and 11 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

Christmas Day: Mostly sunny, with a high near 43. West wind between 4 and 7 mph becoming calm.

Ok looks real good...

This location has 4 Features,
If any of you hiked or Kayaked with me before, i like features and i want you to see them also (geologic, geographic, historic, famous, infamous..etc) and the entire hike/walk / (even kayak) event is geared towards features and frequent stops of exploration for socialization without having to go for miles and miles and never getting to know anyone or long enough to see something i or someone else never knew existed just 20 feet away from the beaten path.....etc
Oh and I dont like to tell you what the features are, you will see for your self..besides i dont want the other hiking groups to have faciniting places to go to LOL...

Anyway, this place is in Glastonbury, so close ya never would have known its there and has been a place where i and some friends used to ride to on our bycycles as kids...

Parking is very limited if at all with the snow blocking the trail entrance so one car is better..etc..

Meet at AL's at 10, its only about 10 minutes away from here...


Ask for directions to here if you need them... al-r

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: A simple event before heading out to the Christmas Dinners
